short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension for customizing the videos per row.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension for customizing the videos per row, posts per row, shelf items per row and etc.

Features:
- Support light and dark theme.
- Hide Channel Profile.
- Display Full Title for Video.
- Dynamic Video Per Row.
- Customizing Videos per Row.
- Customizing Posts per Row.
- Customizing Shelf Items per Row.

Source Code: https://github.com/sapondanaisriwan/youtube-row-fixer
Bug Report: https://github.com/sapondanaisriwan/youtube-row-fixer/issues
